naslov: Prodaja - Dvoetažni, četverosobni stan/kuća + garaža 120m2 - Perjavica (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Prodaja - Četverosobni, dvoetažni stan/kuća + garaža 120 m2 - Perjavica Prošećite nekretninom na sljedećem linku: https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=bptm7HiUuqj Prodajemo četverosobni, dvoetažni stan/kuću koji se nalazi na Perjavici. Radi se o dvije zgrade, odnosno ukupno 6 stanova/kuća u nizu. Stan ima 120,10 m2 obračunski te se sastoji od prizemlja i kata te krovne terase. Pripada mu garaža + vanjsko parkirno mjesto. Prizemlje se sastoji od: ulaznog prostora, dnevnog boravka s blagovaonicom koji je koncipiran kao open space, kuhinje,  toaleta i loggie. Stubištem se dolazi na kat gdje se nalazi pretprostor s tri spavaće sobe od kojih jedna ima vlastitu kupaonicu, još jedna zajednička kupaonica, dvije loggie i dvije terase. Stubištem se dolazi na prostranu krovnu terasu s koje se pruža otvoren pogled prema gradu. Grijanje je podno na dizalicu topline. Svaki kat ima postavljene klima uređaje. Stoalarija je prvoklasna PVC, iznutra bijele, a izvana antracit boje, a ulazna vrata su protuprovalna. Zahvaljujući staklenim stijenama, dnevni boravak ima dovoljno prirodne svjetlosti. Stan je orijentiran na istočnu stranu. S obzirom da se radi o stanovima/kućama u nizu, problem buke riješen je odličnom zvučnom izolacijom. Balkoni su obloženi protukliznim keramičkim pločicama 1. klase. U kupaonicama će biti postavljeni walk in tuševi te viseće školjke vrhunske kvalitete. Svaki stan bit će opremljen video portafonom. Stan se nalazi na mirnoj lokaciji, okruženoj zelenilom, a autubusna stanica udaljena je svega minutu od lokacije. For Sale - Four-Bedroom, Two-Story Apartment/House + Garage 120 m² - Perjavica Take a walk through the property via the following link: https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=bptm7HiUuqj We are selling a four-bedroom, two-story apartment/house located in Perjavica. The property consists of two buildings, with a total of 6 apartments/houses in a row. The apartment has a total of 120.10 m² (net area) and includes a ground floor, first floor, and a roof terrace. It comes with a garage and an outdoor parking space. The ground floor comprises an entrance area, a living room with a dining area designed as an open space, a kitchen, a toilet, and a loggia. A staircase leads to the first floor, where there is a hallway and three bedrooms, one of which has an en-suite bathroom, another shared bathroom, two loggias, and two terraces. Another staircase leads to the spacious roof terrace with an open view of the city. The heating system is underfloor heating with a heat pump. Each floor has air conditioning units. The windows are high-quality PVC, white on the inside and anthracite on the outside, and the entrance door is a security door. Thanks to the glass walls, the living room receives plenty of natural light. The apartment is oriented to the east. Since the property consists of row houses/apartments, noise issues are addressed with excellent sound insulation. The balconies are covered with non-slip first-class ceramic tiles. The bathrooms will feature walk-in showers and high-quality wall-mounted toilets. Each apartment will be equipped with a video intercom. The apartment is located in a quiet area surrounded by greenery, and the bus station is only one minute away. Bonus nekretnine d.o.o. Osredak 4, Zagreb
